name: Quran Tafsir
description: Study the interpretation and explanation of the Holy Quran, understanding its meanings, context, and applications.

name: Hadith Studies
description: Learn about the sayings, actions, and approvals of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) and their authenticity and significance.
